attributes.action: Stop hulls Beverley gate been filled in by hull city council
attributes.background: Please help by signing the petition to help save the historical remains of Beverley gate in Hull city centre , which hull city council want to fill in and bury as part of there multi million pound city centre face lift...

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Hull City Council. You can find out more about starting a petition to Hull City Council here:

http://www.hullcc.gov.uk/petitions

You could also contact local councillors about this. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
